official_title: A concurrent resolution requesting the President to direct the Secretary of Commerce to conduct a study regarding trade and tariff barriers with respect to international trade in services.

summary.text: Requests the President to direct the Secretary of State, the Secretary of Commerce, and others to conduct a study on trade and tariff barriers with respect to international trade in services. Directs the President to transmit a report containing the findings of such study to Congress no later than December 31, 1983.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution requesting the President to direct the Secretary of Commerce to conduct a study regarding trade and tariff barriers with respect to international trade in services.
